name: Kshama Mumbai
about: I am a senior at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in Economics with a double minor in International Relations and Survey Research & Data Analytics. I'm deeply passionate about venture capital and the potential it holds to transform industries and shape the future. I am driven by the opportunity to identify and support innovative startups that have the potential to disrupt markets and create meaningful impact.

positions.subtitle: University of Pennsylvania
positions.description: BORDERS AND BOUNDARIES RESEARCH PROJECT-Analyzed the impact of border infrastructure on trade, focusing on the role of One-Stop Border Posts in Africa and their facilitation of intra-regional trade. Conducted in-depth research and data analysis to assess the economic implications of border management systems with Professor Beth Simmons. Delivered a comprehensive poster presentation on key findings at the 2023 Borders and Boundaries Conference, contributing to academic discourse on international trade dynamics.
positions.title: Research Assistant
positions.description_html:
BORDERS AND BOUNDARIES RESEARCH PROJECT-
Analyzed the impact of border infrastructure on trade, focusing on the role of One-Stop Border Posts in Africa and their facilitation of intra-regional trade. Conducted in-depth research and data analysis to assess the economic implications of border management systems with Professor Beth Simmons.
Delivered a comprehensive poster presentation on key findings at the 2023 Borders and Boundaries Conference, contributing to academic discourse on international trade dynamics.
